Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType>
class stBasicMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >

This abstract class is the basic class for all stBasicXXXXMetricEvaluator classes.

Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.usp.nosp@m..br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)

Member Function Documentation

template<class ObjectType >
virtual stDistance stBasicMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >::GetDistance ( ObjectType *  o1,
ObjectType *  o2 
)
pure virtual

This method calculates the metric distance between 2 objects.

Parameters
obj1Object 1.
obj2Object 2.
Returns
The distance between to objects.
Note
This method is required to fulfil the stMetricEvaluator interface.

Implemented in stBasicLEditMetricEvaluator< ObjectType, DataType >, stBasicBasicSquareChiSquaredMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicSquaredChordMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicBrayCurtisMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicCanberraMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicManhatanMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicEuclideanMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, and stBasicLInfinityMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >.

ObjectType *  o2 
)
pure virtual

This method calculates the metric distance between 2 objects raised by the power of 2.

obj1Object 1.
obj2Object 2.
Note
This method is required to fulfil the stMetricEvaluator interface.
